mapper.select: SELECT TBU.UNIVERSITY_NAME, TBU.UNIVERSITY_LOGO_IMG_NAME, TBU.UNIVERSITY_LOGO_IMG_PATH, TBE.UNIVERSITY_EXHIBITION_DATE, TBE.UNIVERSITY_EXHIBITION_STATE, TBE.UNIVERSITY_EXHIBITION_TITLE, TBE.UNIVERSITY_EXHIBITION_LOCATION, TBM.MAJOR_NAME FROM TBL_UNIVERSITY TBU JOIN TBL_MAJOR TBM ON TBM.UNIVERSITY_ID = TBU.ID JOIN TBL_UNIVERSITY_EXHIBITION TBE ON TBE.MAJOR_ID = TBM.ID ORDER BY TBE.UNIVERSITY_EXHIBITION_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_UNIVERSITY (UNIVERSITY_NAME, UNIVERSITY_LOCATION, UNIVERSITY_HOMEPAGE) VALUES (#{universityName}, #{universityLocation}, #{universityHomepage})
